Actions.Name: Entombment of Iz
Actions.Description: The Immortalist entombs a character in a magical sarcophagus. While inside, they are immobile, winded+, and are blinded, but can otherwise be targeted normally. The Sarcophagus is a height 1 terrain piece with 10 hp that is destructible. Attacks automatically hit and it is destroyed when it reaches 0. It has resistance to damage from the character inside it.
